content: in this legal case the district court in ljubljana made a decision regarding the inheritance of a deceased person the deceased had a property and unpaid pension benefits the court determined that the widow and daughter are the intestate heirs of the deceased according to the law the division of goods was supposed to be equal between the heirs but the widow decided to waive her share in favor of the daughter as a result the daughter will inherit the entire estate the court fees for the case amounted to 648 euros the courts decision is final and the necessary entries will be made in the land register the net value of the estate is estimated to be 76000 euros
